faqs.question: What is this product?
faqs.answer: This product is designed to improve skincare results.

faqs.question: Who can use this product?
faqs.answer: It is suitable for most skin types.

faqs.question: How should this product be used?
faqs.answer: Follow the usage instructions provided with the product.

product_page.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
benefits: Reduces appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
product_page.how_to_use: Apply 2-3 drops to face and neck after cleansing and toning. Gently massage until absorbed.
product_page.safety_information: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

product_b.name: Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Serum
benefits: Reduces appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

differences.benefits: Brightens skin tone vs Reduces appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

comparison_page.recommendation: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a more affordable option with similar benefits to Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Serum
